Reviews.Content: I purchased the tablet for my grandson, and he loves it.  Maybe now his mom can have her Ipad back!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Sarah White
Reviews.Content: My Daughter broke the screen to her last Leap Pad 2, So I ordered this one I love the fact that it comes with a charger to charge the batteries since her last one didn't do that I would have to take the batteries out to charge them, the Doc Mcstuffins wallpapers are really cut and come on guys it comes with a $20 Card with it what a steal!!! The only thing I was like umm okay about is it comes with a Notepad and a Calendar that I am pretty sure my 3yr old could care less about, But other then that she loves it and can work it better then I can!!

Reviews.Title: LeapPad2 the greatest!!
Reviews.Author: Linda Wimer
Reviews.Content: I find the LeapPad2 something my students can use and learn.  When I saw it in an ad I thought it would be perfect for the students.  They were what I was looking for to help my students to succeed in school.

Reviews.Title: The Doc is in and my 3 year old loves it!
Reviews.Author: On the journey
Reviews.Content: My daughter absolutely loves it! She is a huge Doc McStuffins fan so the theme is perfect for her. We used the download card to purchase the Doc McStuffins game and she couldn't be happier. She is 3 so she is still getting the hang of it. I see this leappad being one of her favorite toys for a long time since we can purchase older games for her as her skills grow.

Reviews.Title: Great Learning tool
Reviews.Author: philip nassar
Reviews.Content: Four year old granddaughter loves it! She uses it all the time. It is a great learning tool. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Granddaughter seems to like it
Reviews.Author: BahBah Black Sheep
Reviews.Content: I truly don't know enough about the tablet to leave a review.  It was shopped to me on time and was as described by the seller.  My daughter tells me my granddaughter likes it (she's only 2).  At this point, she needs to 'grow into it' and we will be buying some age appropriate aps for her.

Reviews.Title: My kids love it and and I love it because they learn to read and write
Reviews.Author: William Garcia
Reviews.Content: All three of my kids love their LeapPad2. LeapFrog has games for reading, writing, Mathematics, science and many more. Get the LeapPad2 with the bundled charger. You don't have to buy batteries so you just have to charge the charger which will save you money and time going to the store.

Reviews.Title: My niece loves it. Love the camera feature. As she gets older I will buy her
Reviews.Author: Heather Wiltshire
Reviews.Content: Love the camera feature. As she gets older I will buy her some more apps that will help her development.

Reviews.Title: expensive games
Reviews.Author: ADA MIRANDA
Reviews.Content: The Pad is very nice but the games,are very expensive!Beside that my granddaughters love the tablet!They still use my kindle fire,because there aremany free games!

Reviews.Title: Short lived
Reviews.Author: JUDE
Reviews.Content: My child loved it, but it only lasted 5 days. The screen cracked and there are NO replacement screens available. I would have thought that this being for a younger child the screen would have been made better.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful game/learning device!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Browne "Cyndy Browne"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 2 1/2 yr. old Grandson, and he loves it!! I like that we can buy games that will grow with him. I also bought the skin and carry case to go with this. LeapFrog makes the best products, I have been buying their stuff for years now!

Reviews.Title: My daughter loves it!
Reviews.Author: Qwerty
Reviews.Content: I purchased this bundle for my 5, almost 6 year old for Christmas. She loves it, and plays with it often. It's great for car rides! We try to keep it on the charger when not in use, but we have forgotten a few times, and the battery hasn't died yet!

Reviews.Title: very happy with product.
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: Works excellent!  I bought it for my two year old for Christmas and he plays with it non stop! I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: a big thumbs up
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: My daughter love it... I'm so happy to got this for her as a Christmas gift...since she have it she plays all day

Reviews.Title: They forgot to remember this is a child's toy...
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Vannoy
Reviews.Content: What an amazing toy. 5 mins into playing with it, my child had already scratched the screen. Would someone please tell me why they wouldn't include a screen protector on a child's toy? Durability just isn't there. So disappointed...

Reviews.Title: grandson loves it
Reviews.Author: Doug Jones
Reviews.Content: I purchased it for my grandson for christmas he loves it now he leaves my smartphone alone. He calls it his big phone.

Reviews.Title: Tablet for kids
Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: My 4 year old Grand son wanted a Kindle Fire like mine. I found this a lot more suited for his needs. He loves it and other family members can buy products for it when his birthday comes around.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Buy a kindle instead or other inexpensive tablet.  This device is old technology with apps being limited to the company who prices low level software way too high.  Better to get a kindle with a very padded case and with parent controls in place.

Reviews.Title: Great price, great shipping
Reviews.Author: Amber Feller
Reviews.Content: my 2 year old is happily entertained and learning lots on this item. it was the perfect christmas gift with fast delivery

Reviews.Title: Its Okay
Reviews.Author: jose ortega
Reviews.Content: My son does not seem to be interested in it very much, I think the games are a bit over his head, hes 3. Maybe when he gets older he will play with it.

Reviews.Title: Best Pre-K Tablet
Reviews.Author: Andrew Ramirez
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product for my 4 year old for Christmas this year and have been very happy with the product. I had been going between the LeapPad2 and the Vtech but decided on this one after doing some research and I'm very happy I sprung the extra money and went for quality. The device is fast, the processor keeps my sons attention by keeping wait times to almost none. Apps and games load quickly and the touch screen reacts promptly. This device is very sleek and well designed. The buttons on the front face are minimal and small and I believe that keeps him from wanting to touch them. Home, power, and 2 for sound adjustment and that's it. The device is very well made with a plastic that seems very sturdy though I'd still recommend a gel case which fit very well. The apps have been great, especially the interactive storybooks. I highly recommend this product for toddler to K. I purchased one for the 8 year old daughter as well but realized after a few hours of play that she was going to be unchallenged and become board with it so we returned it and opted for the Nook HD instead, which was much better suited for her. The apps on this LeaPad2 only go up to a 3rd grade level and she is already 1/2 way through 2nd and reading higher than that so.. not such a good choice for the older kids but for the young ones there is none better than the LeapPad2

Reviews.Title: VERY EXPENSIVE APPS!!!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Eberle
Reviews.Content: Ive dumped $50 into this already, and my 2 year old is already bored. I got this for her in hopes she would leave my phone alone… But NOPE. Its not as user friendly as my iPhone… You would think they would make this totally kid friendly… BUT IT IS NOT.

Reviews.Title: LeapFrog LeapPad2
Reviews.Author: Adriene
Reviews.Content: My 2 year old granddaughter loves it! She plays with it all the time.  My daughter is very happy now!

Reviews.Title: great choice!
Reviews.Author: Lisa M. Harris
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a cousin's niece for an early Christmas present. Arrived on time via Prime and broke two days later when her mother tried to connect with the system, register and upgrade. I contacted Amazon and they immediately shipped another one to me via Prime. That tablet arrived the day the family was driving back to Texas from Arizona! Awesome customer service, great app selection to gift and a six year age range of applications is awesome. Will recommend to a friend for certain!

Reviews.Title: Obsessed
Reviews.Author: Emily Boover
Reviews.Content: Santa brought the Doc McStuffins LeapPad for our 5 year old daughter. She's a huge fan of Doc, so it was a big deal it had her all over it!! She is obsessed with her LeapPad. She loves playing the games and it is very user friendly. She drags it around by the stylus, so im not sure how it will hold up over the long haul. But so far, it has been a huge positive! Learning+fun=:)

Reviews.Title: great for toddlers
Reviews.Author: kris
Reviews.Content: Very well made and great software.  I wish the touch screen were just a bit more sensitive.  Sometimes it takes several tries to actually activate a "button".

Reviews.Title: Mac1105
Reviews.Author: monica Blaich
Reviews.Content: We love this tablet!  We got it for our 2 year old daughter, so she will have to grow into it a bit, but the ebooks we added are awesome and some of the included apps are really fun.

Reviews.Title: This is the perfect gift for my 3yr old
Reviews.Author: vagoood
Reviews.Content: We got this so my 3yr old could play games with her own device.  She loves it.  The battery holds a long charge.  It is super easy to set up and play games, draw and practice writing letters.  Best gift we have ever purchased.

Reviews.Title: So worth it
Reviews.Author: Anita Moseley
Reviews.Content: Best educational toy for my 5 year old grandson.  Educational and fun all in one. Highly recommend it for pre schoolers and elementary children

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: patty lube
Reviews.Content: i purchased this for my grandson and he loves it. i wanted one that could be recharged so you don't use so many batteries

Reviews.Title: Mommy of Twin 2 year olds
Reviews.Author: Quishawna D. Bronson "napoleon"
Reviews.Content: My girls love it! I thought they would end up breaking them but they actually have learned to pick what they want to watch or play and understand the concept pretty well. The 3 year old games are closer to what they understand best.

Reviews.Title: Great learning toy!
Reviews.Author: S. Hickey
Reviews.Content: My 6 year old son loves playing with his leap pad.  It is fun and educational.  I would recommend buying this for girls or boys.

Reviews.Title: fun for hours
Reviews.Author: Sue loves books!
Reviews.Content: My 6 yr old gets very frustrated with computer games when she isn't sure how to play them, but this has been very easy for her to use and even my 3 yr old has enjoyed playing with it.  I am buying a 2nd one for him.

Reviews.Title: So far just a wonderful toy
Reviews.Author: Dedesol "babysol"
Reviews.Content: As today, January 2014 the leappad has been amazing. My daughter has completely forgot about my kindle and plays with her leappad every day. The quality of the video is amazing. Since it came with a $20 value card included, I used the card to buy one game and one ebook. But I did it just because the Leapfrog website had an special sale. I think my daughter had enough to keep her entertained with just the applications that came included in the toy. I keep in mind that this is just a toy. I bought it here on special for less than the current price listed, so I have not been extremely picky about it. She is playing and hopefully learning at the same time and I'm happy with that.It didn't take daddy too long to have it set up, and so far the games we purchased for her have been working just fine. I haven't try any of the cartridges so I can't tell about those yet. But I'll update my review once I try them. And by the way, if you want to know more about the toy, there is someone here who wrote a very detailing review comparing the Leappad 2 with the Ultra. That review is amazing and it helped me to decide what kind of LeapPad to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Easy for 4 year old
Reviews.Author: Ronald Bartels
Reviews.Content: Our granddaughter opened it up and said "I do not need your phone to do my work on now" and after charging went right to using it.

Reviews.Title: My 3 yr old loves!
Reviews.Author: Marybeth
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure if this product would be too advanced for my daughter, but she LOVES it!  I thought I would have to sit down and teach her how to use it, but instead she teaches me!  The songs that are already programmed in it are very educational and catchy.  My husband even said, "Yeah...definitely a good investment."  That says a lot being as he never agrees to anything I suggest for Christmas! LOL  Great product, would recommend 100%!

Reviews.Title: Great toy!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Trahey "SDT"
Reviews.Content: My 2 year old grandson loves this. The only drawback is he loves Mickey Mouse and most of the games for this are Minnie Mouse. I hope they make some new ones that are Mickey so little boys can enjoy this as much as little girls. There are lots of other games/apps though so I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: P Burnett
Reviews.Content: Great value to buy the Leap Pad and the charger together , didn't do that last time and regretted it.

Reviews.Title: my toddler loves this!!
Reviews.Author: terry keefer
Reviews.Content: we got this for my 3 yr old and she loves it. it is easy for her to understand and simple to play.

Reviews.Title: leapfrom LeapPad2 power Learning Tablet Green
Reviews.Author: JOYCE C TUOHEY
Reviews.Content: More importantly my 3 year old great grandson loves it.  It's is favorite christmas present and is waiting patiently for more batteries.

Reviews.Title: my 2 1/2 year old LOVES this!
Reviews.Author: Amanda S.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 2 1/2 year old who is constantly trying to swipe my older daughters tablet or my kindle. I thought this would be a great way for her to have her own tablet but get a more sturdy, toddler friendly option. She loves it! She has played with this tablet for more than a couple hours every day since she opened it on Christmas morning. She received several of the games for the 3+ range and has really enjoyed all of them. I love that the stylus is attached, there are a lot of options for cases but I went with a silicone cover to help protect it when she drops it because I KNOW she will, eventually. The power pack is awesome. Recharging is a breeze and I think it will come in super handy when traveling. Over all, I think this is a wonderful product. I have quite a few leap frog items, and by far this gets used the most. I would highly recommend this product for 2 years and over.

Reviews.Title: 4 year old loves it
Reviews.Author: terri a carpenter
Reviews.Content: We bought it for our 4 year old granddaughter.  After she figured out what it was it became her favorite present.

Reviews.Title: LeapPad2
Reviews.Author: Veronica B.
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this item. I recommend this item for children 5 to 8 yrs. Very educational.I would buy this item again for another child.

Reviews.Title: Perfect tablet
Reviews.Author: Deloris Brown
Reviews.Content: Cant get my niece to put this tablet down. Very easy to navigate. She learned on her own and she is 3yrs old.

Reviews.Title: 2 year old LOVES!
Reviews.Author: H. Parsons
Reviews.Content: For our just-turned two year old, we weren't sure whether to purchase an iPad or a LeapPad for a Christmas gift.  We debated, read, compared, etc. until we had about given up on getting her a tablet at all - until I saw the Black Friday advertisement for this bundle.  So, we purchased the bundle well aware that our daughter would likely not enjoy the LeapPad since she's had access to iPads routinely.  Interestingly, the opposite is true.  She's had the LeapPad and has been playing with it for about two weeks, and when given the choice between my iPad Mini and her LeapPad, she consistently chooses the LeapPad.  I think it's a combination of liking knowing it's "hers" and we used the $20 gift card that came with the LeapPad to buy several age-appropriate games, books, etc.  We are so glad we gave the LeapPad a shot.

Reviews.Title: LeapFrog LeapPad2 Power Learning Tablet
Reviews.Author: J. Roadarmel
Reviews.Content: The LeapFrog Learning Tablet was exactly what I wanted for my 2 1/2 year old grandson. So far it is keeping him quite entertained and it seems to be holding up quite well (although he has only had it for a week!).

Reviews.Title: GREAT GIFT!!!
Reviews.Author: Kate Herbst
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these for my twins for xmas.  The kids loved them.  One did stop working after a few days but Amazon was great about sending out a new one.  My daughter was a happy girl when she got the new one 2 days later!

Reviews.Title: Leapfrog 2 is Great for learning!!!
Reviews.Author: Jasmine
Reviews.Content: It is a very good learning tool and it keeps the kids busy!! The only thing I have to do know is buy a cool gel skin for my daughters leapfrog so that if she do drop the leapfrog that it wouldn't break.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase Great Valu
Reviews.Author: Brian Williams
Reviews.Content: Got a super sweet deal on this purchase.  Great value.  Got an extra game download choice I didn't know was included when I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: I was expecting more
Reviews.Author: Kristen Franzen
Reviews.Content: I think this is a great item but I had my hopes up and did not do the research on the apps, more expensive then I would like.

Reviews.Title: great item
Reviews.Author: Cindy Oertle
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter loves this! She just turned 4 yrs old and was always wanting to play with her mommy's IPad so I bought this for her. It's great.

Reviews.Title: my daughter loves this
Reviews.Author: wendy olinger
Reviews.Content: My 4 year old loves the leap pad. There are lots of educational games that contain her favorite cartoon characters. I liked this because the price was great when at the time of purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Anderson
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and the kids love it! Just a tip for multiple kid families that have more than one leap pad don't buy the cartridges... You can download the games from the site and install on both devices.

Reviews.Title: 4 Year Old loves it!!!!
Reviews.Author: HowardG
Reviews.Content: Great learning tool.  4 year old spends hours playing the games, has a great time, and is also learning something.  What more could you ask!  Quality build, and getting the Doc McStuffins bundle at a reduced price was icing on the cake.  Wouldnt pay any extra for this bundle, but the Leappad itself is great.

Reviews.Title: not pleased
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: I was under the impression that the doc mcstuffins game came with this leapfrog. Unfortunately,  the game is extra for $30. I was very disappointed to see it had so little already installed.

Reviews.Title: Love this !
Reviews.Author: Kaly Strople
Reviews.Content: My daughter just turned 5, she got this for christmas and has not put it down! I love this bundle, the charger is great and the gift card to get more apps was used quickly.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: J. Ellenbecker
Reviews.Content: My daughter (4) loves her new Leappad 2! It's adorable with Doc McStuffins on it and so easy to use!

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable deal
Reviews.Author: Meg
Reviews.Content: I got this entire bundle for a great price and my 15 min old luvs it. You get so much for ur money

Reviews.Title: Father of two girls
Reviews.Author: Sevket Taskin
Reviews.Content: I bought two of this for both of my girls who are 2 and 4 and they love it. 20$ gift card is hard to pass. What a dal

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: robert adams
Reviews.Content: It's exactly how it was listed. Live this fantastical device. It's amazing to watch a child play with it for hours

Reviews.Title: It's awesome
Reviews.Author: Corie
Reviews.Content: This came in a timely manner and is amazing!! My niece loves it and the rechargeable batteries make it even more amazing no more needing batteries every other day!!

Reviews.Title: The toy that just keeps my daughter entertained for hours
Reviews.Author: leesa
Reviews.Content: I choose this rating because my daughter absolutly loves it. she has not put it down since christmas.. But did have to get headphones cause its a bit loud

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: M. Green
Reviews.Content: It was everything I had thought it would be and my son has notput it down since he got it!

Reviews.Title: Great toy!
Reviews.Author: J. R. Padilla "Musical Momma"
Reviews.Content: The bundle is adorable and my daughter loves it! The only reason I rated a 4 and not a 5 is because we had a rough time loading everything with the mavericks operating system on our Mac. We finally got it running with some work. There is a good number of apps on the device and a ton more available for purchase on the site. Plenty of non-gaming apps like books and music for her to sing along to. Overall a cute and durable toy.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: David Hill
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for a toddler. Something that my daughter can grow with. It is very easy to use and educational

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product.
Reviews.Author: Brandi Newton
Reviews.Content: My daughter loved this suprise under the tree. She has spent countless hours playing on it. I love it too because it is learning oriented and fun at the same time.

Reviews.Title: Kid iPad
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: My daughter (6) loves her "kid iPad. She navigates thought the menus and apps with easy. The photo editing program is fun and keeps her busy for a long time. The rechargeable batteries seem to last quite a while.  My daughter is thrilled with it so therefor so am I!!

Reviews.Title: Fun for my toddler
Reviews.Author: Janine B. Stillwell "jbb"
Reviews.Content: I deducted one star as the calendar option would not let me set dec 25, 2013. It kept defaulting to 2011, which made me feel as if this item was a two yr older model. Other than that, it's a great toy for little hands. The camera pics are very grainy, but my toddler doesn't mind. She likes to use the paint shop to draw on them anyway.  I wish there were more inexpensive games for toddlers. Paying $10-$25.  for a game she may or may not play is expensive. There should be trial options with the option to buy after like two wks or something. Overall, nice toy.  However I've yet to figure out how to change the extra backgrounds. They're only on screen for less than a minute anyway, so no big deal. I would have preferred a little extra $ toward an app instead.

Reviews.Title: Great educational toy!
Reviews.Author: Medinagirl
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my 3 year old grandson and he loves it -- very educational and sturdy item made specifically for children 3 to 8.  Highly recommend it.  The battery charger is a great extra feature so be sure sure to purchase package with a charger for an extra value!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Rebekah Cross
Reviews.Content: My 3 year old loves it! She loves that it has Doc Mcstuffins all over it and that she can change the images on her home screen to other pictures of Doc.

Reviews.Title: leappad
Reviews.Author: Kelly Covey
Reviews.Content: Product came as expected.  My 4 year old daughter loves using it.  It is easy for her to use and she has enjoyed the included apps.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Silver
Reviews.Content: Great I love this product.. It was everything I expected and more my 3 year old loves it and it's a great learning tool..

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!!
Reviews.Author: Nerisha Farquharson
Reviews.Content: My 18 month old absolutely love it. its a real value bundle. I note however that the card to redeem free apps was not included.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Sharon Smith
Reviews.Content: Very educational for my granddaughter and she likes to play the little games , she also loves music the little tunes it plays

Reviews.Title: Super!
Reviews.Author: Kathy Hanson
Reviews.Content: Great gift for my grandson. He unwrapped it and he was able to use it right away. I was pleased.

Reviews.Title: screen shatters easily
Reviews.Author: Amber Irwin
Reviews.Content: My two year old took it from her sister and dropped it in the car. It's not a far drop and the screen completely shattered

Reviews.Title: Nice Product
Reviews.Author: Van Hammer
Reviews.Content: My daughter finally has her LeapPad 2 and loves it.  The resolution is not the best in the world but I don't think the kids mind that too much.  This Bundle is a wonderful starter kit.  I definitely suggest ordering the cartridges directly from Amazon as they are cheaper than the APP store through LeapFrog

Reviews.Title: Such a fab deal!
Reviews.Author: ELKohl
Reviews.Content: My daughter was so excited when she got this LeapPad 2! It is very cute and came with two extra stylis'. It also came with the rechargable battery pack and it was all quite a steal!

Reviews.Title: My 4 year old daughter LOVES it!!!
Reviews.Author: Karissa Gick Randall
Reviews.Content: This is by far, my 4 year old daughter's favorite gift from Santa this year.  We love the fact that it's rechargeable, so that it doesn't "eat" up batteries like previous gaming devices we've owned.  She got the InnoTab 2S last year.  She didn't take to that one as much.  Maybe she just wasn't mature enough yet, but this one seems to boot up much more quickly than the InnoTab did.  I would highly recommend this for preschool age children.

Reviews.Title: My daughter loves it.
Reviews.Author: Makaylynn's Mommy
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping!! My daughter got it for Christmas. She loves it and I got her 2 games with the $20.00 gift card that came with it. Perfect for children 3-6. Thanks for making my daughter happy and teaching her while she plays.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for smart kids
Reviews.Author: Edward M. Gray
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift to my nephew and god-son. He is a very smart little boy and when he opened it, he immediately started working with it to figure out how it worked. Hopefully, it will continue to attract his interest.

Reviews.Title: won't put it down
Reviews.Author: Gaye Fayola Wells
Reviews.Content: my daughter loves it. Can't even get a chance to recharge. The MP3 app. should be included. The camera needs a flash.

Reviews.Title: 3 year old loves this!!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves and can play and occupy her self independently for hours! It is her very own "I pad"

Reviews.Title: Gift for Grandson
Reviews.Author: kcallahan47
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for our grandson and he seems to like it a lot.  A good game for kids 3 - 5 years old.

Reviews.Title: leapfrog
Reviews.Author: highlove
Reviews.Content: who can go wrong with a leapfrog for a 4 year old, my son loves it…he's been carrying it everywhere he goes.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: This is a nice product BUT really needs a protector case considering it is geared for small children!  I've looked online and all i can find are carrying cases!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kristina marsh
Reviews.Content: My 3 year old daughter loves this. She takes it with her wherever she is going. Not only can she watch shows but also play games. She gets so excited when she traces a letter correctly or finds the right shape. Probably the best thing I have bought for her. The only downfall is the need to buy all the apps. However, they are not terribly expensive and are designed by age so it is well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Best price for Leap Pad2
Reviews.Author: Dan Potwin
Reviews.Content: My kid loves it and you can't go wrong with the price for this package. We used the gift card on New Year's and got 3 apps for <$20.

Reviews.Title: Hard to find
Reviews.Author: Newport 3840
Reviews.Content: These were a great buy. Bought them for a 3 and 4 year old. None of the stored had them with the bonus charger

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Ashley Sunday
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it and so do I. Easy for her to use and I know she is playing something educational and fun.

Reviews.Title: Great present!
Reviews.Author: kelly
Reviews.Content: My 2 year old is having a great time figuring out all of the apps! I love the rechargeable batteries!

Reviews.Title: A great educational tool
Reviews.Author: James L.
Reviews.Content: My 6 year old son really enjoys his LeapPad 2!  He is actually learning and playing at the same time.  It is easy to set up and download new games at the Leapfrog.com website.  Some of the games are as little as $5.00 dollars online.  My son is a very active child and he will sit still and could play with it for hours.  We do set limits on how long he can use it because we want him to have some personal interactions and physical exercise, but the LeapPad2 is a great "motivational tool" to correct certain behavioral issues.

Reviews.Title: My three-year-old grandson gives it 5 stars.
Reviews.Author: Linda Myers
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my grandson and he loves it.  His parents have loaded several additional age appropriate games and educational programs.  It's user friendly even for a 3 year old.

Reviews.Title: As good as it gets
Reviews.Author: Neil M. Ryan
Reviews.Content: My girls loved it and it exceeded my expectations. They are 3, 4 and 6 and they each have their own and each of them can enjoy the leap pad with apps for their age.

Reviews.Title: My 2 Year Old Grandbaby LOVES it
Reviews.Author: AReview
Reviews.Content: Well packaged and delivered on a timely basis. I ordered it to save on the wear and tear on my son's iPad. The game is so easy to use and interactive. We set the icons to reseamble the iPad layout and my granddaughter was able to pick it up and play on her own. The games are excellent learning tools! The camera is great and she has stopped stealing our phones to take pictures:). We ordered the bubble guppies with it and she is learning about recycling in a kid-friendly way.

Reviews.Title: will not charge
Reviews.Author: Melissa <31985
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas present for my 5 year old. She only got to use it once and when the batteries wore down, I charged it for a full night and most of the next day. It never charged. I switched outlets and tried again today, no luck. I'm currently trying to return it for a replacement and hoping I just got a defective one. She absolutely loved it the one day that it worked...I'm really disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: tara
Reviews.Content: Wonderful kit. My kiddies love it and I love all it came with for the price.Works well, good quality.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: Deloris Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: got this for my son and he loved it . he is having so much fun with it. I will but more

Reviews.Title: LeapFrog LeapPad2
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: The LeapFrog LeapPad2 arrived quickly after it ordered.  It was in perfect condition and operated perfectly after it was charged.  There are many educational games that can be played on it to assist learning skills in a fun way.  It needed to be charged before use.  This was easily done and returned to original packaging before it was opened as a Christmas gift.  It operated flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Leap pad 2
Reviews.Author: SLINGSHOT
Reviews.Content: I got two of these for christmas for my girls and they love them not too many games the camera is not the greatest and the games are expensive but hey kids like it

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: BKGG
Reviews.Content: Fits great, looks great and protects. Nice product and very well priced. My great grand child loves it, thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: dan-knee
Reviews.Content: ordered this for my niece she absolutely loved it played it all day on Christmas! the product itself is very nice and has so many games!. its very nice quality and easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: Christmas must
Reviews.Author: angela ortiz
Reviews.Content: God daughter loved it. Really love that it includes a wall charger as most of these dont. Also love doc mcstuffins

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Derrick A. Dalton
Reviews.Content: this was definitely a good buy. The free 20 dollar app card alone made this a purchase that was sound for our six year old. Its also very durable

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Nicole D.
Reviews.Content: This was $60 cheaper on this site than in any retail store I went to.  I bought this for my nephew who is 6yrs old for Christmas.  It was easy to set up and seems durable.  I think he will really enjoy this when he opens it on Christmas. He loves cameras and this has 2.  It has sound directions, so it will be easy for him to listen to and learn how to operate it.

Reviews.Title: good fun learning product for young kids
Reviews.Author: Eileen Meehan
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my 3 year old grandson's birthday. He loves it and learned how to use the stylus and navigate the features with ease.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: The product in it self is a good toy. My daughter already love it.  However I am not pleased with it.  I believe it says LeapFrog LeapPad2 Power when I power it on I see its and explorer.  I continue however to setup and register the product and i get to stage four (4) which says download and i cant move from there, I was then which was two days ago and still to today unable to select anything on that page, I contacted customer service regarding the problem and was asked a bunch of questions after talk and holding I was asked to hold down the home key, right arrow key  and down volume key at the same time which i did thinking that would help the problem only to realize that all the additional wallpaper of no longer exist and i am still on # 4.I am not very happy with this.

Reviews.Title: My grandson LOVES it.
Reviews.Author: Martha Healy "Marty"
Reviews.Content: My daughter said their only problem is limiting the time he uses it. It was an instant hit. Can't give more feedback because they're in the midwest and I'm in the east, but they are not usually effusive about my choice of gifts--this time mother and son both were. YEAH.

Reviews.Title: Terrible customer service.
Reviews.Author: Heather Acosta
Reviews.Content: I purchased this bundle a month ago, and have had a problem with getting the "rechargeable" battery pack to charge. I contacted customer service, and their first response was to send me four AA batteries. Then they told me to buy a new AC adapter. When I did that and still didn't get a charge, I was told that the charger isn't meant to charge the batteries. I was confused, but the reason they said this was because they, for some reason, were assuming that I was talking about regular store-bought rechargeable batteries. When I cleared that up, I was told that the item was no longer covered under warranty, because it's been longer than three months- which it hasn't been. Obviously. So far, with accessories and apps included, I have spent nearly $200 on a product for my son that won't do the main advertised function- charge. I suggest you put your money into another company, because LeapFrog is just awful.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value!
Reviews.Author: J. Vazquez
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item due to that it includes the rechargeable battery pack (which costs about $29 if purchased separately).  I made a smart purchase because if I would have purchased the item itself without the battery pack .. I would be wasting a lot of AA batteries!!!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Pat Sahlin "For all things under the sun ther...
Reviews.Content: We bought the LeapPad as a birthday gift for our 3-year-old who is just learning to hear, after having tubes put in his ears.  A whole new world has opened up for him and he is soaking up new information.  We planned to take the Pad on a trip to Mexico with him, and it may be the best investment we have ever made.  He played with it on the plane, in the car, and in the hotel rooms when it got dark outside but he was too wired to go to sleep.  He has already learned a lot from it and his motor skills have taken a big leap forward.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: A hit with my granddaughter.
Reviews.Author: RudyB
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my granddaughter who will be three next month.  She loves it.  Recently went to Amazon and ordered some additional games, but they are for Christmas, so I don't how she will do with them.  I rely on the reviews of others when purchasing from Amazon, so I selected the games according to previous reviews.  Will soon find out if she likes them.

Reviews.Title: First Impression: Needs Some Real Work In Usability, But Great for Learning
Reviews.Author: W. Hall
Reviews.Content: Hello- This is a writeup about my first impressions about the LeapPad2. They're in bullet for easy review.- More complicated than it needs to for a child- I was surprised at the number of decisions and that after almost every decision, the user needs to hit the check box. This creates a lot of unnecessary steps to get going. Example: Let's say I choose the Art application. I should be able to just get going and start drawing. Nope. I have to tap the app, hit a check box after the introduction, then select a 'tool', then am forced to select a color, then tap the check box, then I can draw. WOW. A child should just tap the art app, and start drawing. This is for a toddler, it doesn't need to be this complicated.- This still requires a Stylus. This caused great frustration and confusion for my 3yr old. She is accustomed to starting up the iPad and just getting going with her fingers. She hates the stylus and doesn't want to use it (I can relate). The 1990s called, they'd like they're stylus back.- No built in WiFi. You have to do everything teathered to your computer. Updates take forever and like bullet point 1, there are a lot of uncessary steps to get the device registed. Once registered, its all about buying more apps. Buy Buy Buy.. We get it.. you need to sell apps. Ok. I'll do it, but this is a pretty inconvenient way to do so.- There is no way to tell how charged your battery is. I can't find it anywhere. How do I know if its fully charged before I get on an airplane. On that note, there's no settings anywhere such as brightness, etc… I don't expect a child to care, but a parent does. If they are using it in the dark, it would be nice to turn down the brightness so it doesn't burn my kids eyes.- On the plus side, there are a lot of videos and apps to choose from and its nice that LeapFrog doesn't have the bottomless pit of problems that In-App purchases creates. Bravo LeapFrog. Thank you!- Our 3yr old is having problems getting going on it (compared to so naturally on the iPad), but once she's going, she seems to really like it. Everything on here is about learning and exploring which is great.My advice to LeapFrog… Ditch the expensive COGS of another pad device, and just make terrific application for computers and devices (Pads, Phones, and Computers). LeapFrog is in very very sharky waters trying to compete in the pad market. Your apps are great, but the devices are jus ok.

Reviews.Title: waste of money!!
Reviews.Author: susan
Reviews.Content: It comes with very limited options not to mention a free app for calculator and calendar??I don't think a 3 year old cares about that . everything else you need to pay for and purchase at the leapfrog store therefore you need to create an account login and set up with a credit card to purchase games I don't have time for that!!  I feel like this is just an upgraded version of the Nintendo ds. I really wish I did research before I purchased this product... I will be returning it and putting the money towards a better product like the kindle or Ipad! Needless to say this product disappointed my 3 year old and myself as well. don't invest in it!

Reviews.Title: Poor design for children
Reviews.Author: Teresa McArthur
Reviews.Content: I have an engineering background and this is a terrible design.-Screen broke on first day from being dropped once, while in a protective gel case and in the padded zipper carry case.If the screen breaks that easily, watch out.How it happened:  Parent placed Leap Pad in protective gel case, then placed in the Leap Pad padded case made specifically for the Leap Pad.  The gel case makes it a slightly more snug fit, but that isn't the design problem.  One game was placed in the lid as designed.  My child dropped it once and screen was broken.--The lip of the games is a perfect stress-point that directly impacts the edge of the glass.This is one parent very frustrated that I buy two protective items for the particular device and it is still broken on the first day.LeapFrog voided the warranty and is going to send me a replacement Leap Pad after I ship this one back to them at my cost.Their design problems caused the break.  Not a happy camper.

Reviews.Title: Do your child and yourself a favor, get a Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Fanatic
Reviews.Content: Pay the extra few dollars and get your child a Kindle. For Christmas I got my 5 and 7 year old Kindle's but thought the Kindle would be too advanced for my 3 year old so I bought him the Leap Frog Leap Pad 2.  This device was a waste of money.  First of all I had to download a bunch of software from the Leap Frog website onto my computer (how lame is that?).  If I wanted kids stuff on my computer I wouldn't have purchased a Leap Frog Pad, I would've just let him use my computer. The screen and graphics are about as bad as a first generation Nintendo Game boy. The Kindle has a program for kids that has the ability to be much better for learning and has way more features than the Leap Frog. This technology on the Leap Frog pad is very far behind and really shouldn't be for how much they cost (this thing is expensive).

Reviews.Title: The most flagrant highway robbery since the "$100 printer with $20 ink cartridges"
Reviews.Author: R. Ortiz B.
Reviews.Content: I have no qualms about the quality of this device.  My 4yo absolutely loves it.  She picked tight up on how to use the apps, take pictures, etc.  The apps and games are well chosen and focused on learning abilities.  However, the included content is severely limited (even though this is a 9-app bundle).  The "included apps" are things most people take for granted: a note-taking app, a music player (that does not support your own MP3s, and includes only one set of songs) and a "camera app" for a camera-equipped device.  Other "extra" features include the (very basic and altogether necessary) ability to charge the tablet by plugging it into an AC outlet.  The real problem, though, is when you want to buy more content.  Let's say you want the music to a favorite animated film.  Would you pay $10 for a measly 4 songs and a narrated story?  I did, and rightly felt robbed.  This device is, in fact, the most flagrant highway robbery since the invention of the $100 printer with $20 cartridges.  The Leappad2 itself is inexpensive and highly attractive, the included content well curated but extremely limited.  When you want to buy a game that would cost you $3 in an Android app store, with Leapfrog you fork up $10-20.  In the end, getting this $90 dollar tablet up to speed with a minimal amount of content set me back a total of $150.My advice, bottom line: buy a Kindle with FreeTime and stay clear of this pint-sized money pit.  I certainly wish I had.

Reviews.Title: Most like a "real" tablet...
Reviews.Author: lmc
Reviews.Content: We have bought so many LeapFrog products over the last couple of years (3 kids, 6-8 years old) and they have always been a hit and lasted. The LeapPads are a great line of products for satisfying our boy's wishes for tablets this Christmas but it's a bit of a touch decision on what one to get. For me, the biggest difference between the LeapPads is that only the Ultra has WiFi built in which makes it most like a "real" tablet. It does push the cost up to where you could nearly buy a good adult tablet but then those are not designed with kids in mind.In the end, I thing the LeapPad Ultra Kids' tablet is they way to go.B00CS1WDBI

Reviews.Title: Bought for Granddaughter's and they Love it!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: Mom and Dad love it also.  very easy to use!  keeps the kids occupied and learning depending on your choice of games

Reviews.Title: Who is the LeapPad talking to?
Reviews.Author: Morgan Jones
Reviews.Content: Day after Christmas, grandma got our 3-year-old daughter one.I was watching my child was aimlessly dragging the stylus around the screen."You're doing a great job!" the LeapPad2 enthused.My daughter looked up at me with consternation. "I am?" she said.Has someone with a degree in child development ever stepped foot on company premises?

Reviews.Title: LeapPad Power
Reviews.Author: Natale A. Fruci
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for a Christmas present to our granddaughter.  So far, we have set it up, charged the batteries, and everything seems ok

Reviews.Title: Great taeching tool
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: Free apps are pretty lame otherwise great teaching tool that keeps children busy in places like doctor offices, in the car, etc.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: rosesavignano
Reviews.Content: Again, I love the Leap Frog toys and this is the 3rd leap pad I,ve gotten this year & I know the little guy will love it.

Reviews.Title: child friendly
Reviews.Author: Elemawusi
Reviews.Content: I was more than excited to recieve this product for my daughter. Shipment time was perfect, much much earlier than expected and product is very child friendly but my front camera doesn't work which was disappointing to me and time factor wouldn't allow me to send it back.

Reviews.Title: Very Happ
Reviews.Author: Lianne Fairbairn
Reviews.Content: Everything about the site made it very easy for me to order.  the delivery was easy to track and on time. i would not hesitate to use this site again

Reviews.Title: just ok...
Reviews.Author: Raul Fuentes
Reviews.Content: Just ok. Wouldve preferred additional preloaded apps and easier maneuverability for a 3 u ear old. Overall an average alternative.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product!
Reviews.Author: nate rodgers
Reviews.Content: My daughter really enjoys this product. The product came in perfect condition and the rechargeable batteries is well worth it. We are very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: sucked
Reviews.Author: desiree
Reviews.Content: I didnt like the quality of the item. Needs to be better. Didnt recieve everything in the bundle. So payed for something i didnt get
